Package pizzapazza.math.geometricshape

Class Z4GeometricFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzapazza.math.geometricshape.Z4GeometricShape
      • pizzapazza.math.geometricshape.Z4GeometricCurve
        • pizzapazza.math.geometricshape.Z4GeometricFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Z4JSONable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Z4EllipseFrame, Z4RectangleFrame, Z4RoundRectangleFrame
    public abstract class Z4GeometricFrame
extends Z4GeometricCurve
    Common abstract object for geometric frames. A Z4GeometricFrame is a geometric shape representing a frame curve
    Author:
    gianpiero.diblasi

        Specified by:
        getControlPointConnections in class Z4GeometricShape
        Returns:

      • fromParameters

        protected abstract Z4GeometricFrame fromParameters​(double x,
                                                   double y,
                                                   double w,
                                                   double h,
                                                   double angle,
                                                   double sx,
                                                   double sy)
        Returns a new geometric frame from given parameters
        Parameters:
        x - The x center location of the frame
        y - The y center location of the frame
        w - The half width of the frame
        h - The half height of the frame
        angle - The rotation of the frame
        sx - The x shear of the frame
        sy - The y shear of the frame
        Returns:
        The new geometric frame

      • fromDataChanged

        public Z4GeometricShape fromDataChanged​(def.js.Array<Z4Point> controlPoints,
                                        double x,
                                        double y,
                                        int pointIndex,
                                        double spinnerValue,
                                        int spinnerIndex,
                                        int width,
                                        int height)
        Description copied from class: Z4GeometricShape
        Returns a Z4GeometricShape obtained by this Z4GeometricShape when a data (point or spinner) is changed
        Specified by:
        fromDataChanged in class Z4GeometricShape
        Parameters:
        controlPoints - The control points
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the changed point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the changed point
        pointIndex - The index of the changed point, -1 if no point is changed
        spinnerValue - The changed spinner value
        spinnerIndex - The index of the changed spinner value, -1 if no spinner is changed
        width - The available area width
        height - The available area height
        Returns:
        The geometric shape
